website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a lightweight and comfortable desk hammock.
pros: Weighs only three ounces and folds up small, so it is very transportable
Foam padding makes it extra comfortable, and reinforced straps give it durability
cons: Not the best quality but still great comfort and functionality for the price

customer_reviews.title: Great little ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Great little ottoman. My wife is tiny (5'1") and her feet cannot reach the floor on the plane. (Me and most of the rest of the world don't have this problem). That puts stress on her thighs and tops of her feet from lack of support. This lets her put her feet up and sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Say yes to the foot sling
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5" and the strain flights put on my thighs is just horrible, horrible and I never have the right bag to rest my feet properly. This thing, folds up small and works so well and it can be used the entire flight. I'll never fly without it!!
customer_reviews.author: jj online

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable flight ever, but it was falling apart already.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be uncomfortable on planes with my feet down. I just used it and it worked perfectly!!! For that reason, I'll give it 3 stars. Unfortunately, the quality leaves something to be desired. The strap was ripping apart after my three hour flight. I used it again on the return flight, and again, it still worked and made me so much more comfortable than ever on both of the flights. I don't know if I can fix it, but at least I got use out of it for this trip. Not sure if I would buy another one. Wish it was made better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best travel idea ever! It makes travel so much more comfortable just having the option to put your feet up. I paired this with the J pillow and was able to get some pretty decent sleep on a recent red eye.
customer_reviews.author: MAOtto

customer_reviews.title: I think I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I did take this along on my last international flight because I was in coach. I was able to easily use it once I got it strapped in, and could make any needed adjustments. I’m now thinking of trying to attach this to a table or something for when my 90 year old mother sits for long periods at home in front of the tv. I would not take this along for any airplane class except coach, because upgraded seats will do enough for your comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Garza

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you are over 5'1 or 5'5
customer_reviews.text: While this item is made with quality material, it is only useful for someone for someone around 5 feet tall. I am 5'7 and tried to use this on a recent flight. It was laughable. The adjustable strap is so short there is no way to comfortably rest your legs in the swing if you are an adult. My friend and I had quite a giggle over it after the initial disappointment. Increase the length of the strap to be suitable for more avg US/Europen heights and you would have a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.C

customer_reviews.title: Recommended highly for short people on long flights!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these for airline travel. I am short at 5'2" and my feet don't touch the ground comfortably when I'm sitting all the way back in my seat on the plane. This puts a lot of pressure on the back of my thighs and throws my hips out of whack. All in all it's pretty uncomfortable to sit that way for long trips. This is small, light weight and super easy to to set up. I put my feet right inside and am able to relax in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for my boys
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got 2 boys in the house that are big video gamers. They use to put their feet all over the little trash can under the desk and knock it over. Since they each got a sling under their computer desks, no more trash on the floor! They both really like their slings and either put their feet in them or lay their calves againsts them (like the pic shown). Both positions are comfortable. And they have already lasted longer than I thought they would. I did sew on an extension to the strap to get it to fit around their desks. I’m considering getting them another set for the minivan for long car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you like to put your feet up
customer_reviews.text: I happened upon this product by chance as I did not know they even made a product like this, but I knew it was made for people like me! I love to have my feet up so much that I have a stool by my computer chair. Now I can do without the awkward stool. There is one clip and a long belt. It was easy enough to clip over the width of my narrow desk and behind where the keyboard slides out. I like that the foot rest is barely noticeable, but it is very sturdy and is working great for me. I am so much more comfortable at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT SAVED ME ON MY LAST FLIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is European and my parents live across the country, so needless to say, we have to take loooong flights to visit family and frankly, I hate it. Flying is no pleasure when the numbskull in front of you puts the seat back for a 7 hour flight. This little gadget just seriously saved me on our european flights this summer. It gives you the ability to rest your feet on something, and swing and MOVE them so you are not crunched up and rigid for the flight. It's seriously comfy. I bought them for my son and husband who were both skeptical as hell, and they loved it too. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 for the long flights from the US to Europe. I can honestly not imagine flying without something like this now that I have used it! It is so easy to change positions and stay comfortable. However my moms broke on the flight home. I would probably buy another one for a long flight to save my legs and feet but it sucks to think that they might not last one trip. So far the other one has held up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, straps too short for 5' 6" person
customer_reviews.text: I travel a TON and always try and sleep on my long flights. The problem is where to put my feet (I usually try and prop them up on my bags). This works well for helps to elevate my feet. However, the strap is MUCH too short. I could not use it as pictured, but instead had to strap it around the center/back bar of my tray. This worked okay, except it didn't spread out the rest quite enough. The rest of the quality was quite nice so hopefully they can get the strap length fixed.
customer_reviews.author: MDL

customer_reviews.title: Back relief
customer_reviews.text: I have used the foot read twice now and my only complaint is that the snap does get in the way of the tray you have to harness it to. It did help with my back and I will continue to use it. The flight attendant almost made me take it down for safety reasons. I'm going to have to always get a window seat so that it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver on long hauls!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and airplane seat are so rarely proportionate for my height. My feet are either slightly dangling or my back cramps from not being against the seat back on any flight slinger than a few hours. This summer I took this on a 28 and a 30 hour flight and my legs and back we totally fine. I’m so happy I have this & I’m bringing on every flight from now on.
customer_reviews.author: isis

customer_reviews.title: It's better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable foot holding strap made a huge difference in my sitting experience. My legs get numb when I fly and that saved me. There wasn't enough room to stretch out my legs. I was able to raise them in a bent position which wasn't what I was hoping to do. The foot-rest turned up on one side when I stretched my legs through. It's better than nothing. The item is very well constructed, and I imagine it would be comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Broke on First Use
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke in the first use, Not strong enough and strap can be small for some tables. Not worth it dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Kachwalla

customer_reviews.title: Works like you would expect it to.
customer_reviews.text: Work just as it says it does. I'm the type of person on the plane who is always trying to get their feet up on the seat, a back pack, or the seat in front of me with out anyone noticing.... so this helps stop me from doing that. I am just not comfortable with my feet on the ground, I don't know what it is. We tried this on our last trip and it worked as beautifully as you could expect in a crammed space. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: These really helped my legs on my flight to Europe from the USA. It takes you a minute to get them dialed in on where you need to place them on your plane tray. But I figured it out! Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Holli B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes travel comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This little sling is great for air travel. I have traveled about 75,000 air miles since I bought it and it makes coach a little more comfortable. This does not work in first class- there is no tray table. Other travelers and flight attendants have inquired about this sling. It is particularly helpful for shorter travelers!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I HATE having my feet dangling, so this was an amazing find. It's a soft material and it feels nice on bare feet. It works so perfectly with the tray tables on planes. I love that it's adjustable. It served me well on my 9 hour flight to Copenhagen. It's like a tiny hammock for your footsies. I love it so much and I'm using this on every flight I ever take.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for plane travel
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but does not quite work. I bought it to be more comfortable on a plane but it just ended up pulling on the seat in front of me every time I moved, which made the person in front quite mad.
customer_reviews.author: Yonnie

customer_reviews.title: It helped my husband better so he kept his
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both bought one to try it out during our trip to Europe. It definitely helped stretch our legs out and feel more relaxed. It helped my husband better so he kept his. I move too much to keep my legs in the sling but if I travel alone, I'll be borrowing it on occassion.
customer_reviews.author: Jo G

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, when I first bought this, I was sooooo skeptical.... like come on, a foot sling. I tried it on my flight hesitantly and it’s AMAZING. I’m 5,5 and my feet resting on the sling makes it so much more comfortable on the flight. It’s great on my hips and my bottom. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: ... trip in January to go to Florida it was great I didn’t use it how it’s pictured I put ...
customer_reviews.text: Are you just on a trip in January to go to Florida it was great I didn’t use it how it’s pictured I put my feet in it instead and it was wonderful it’s very compact I was able to put it in a tiny little purse and bring it with me everyone was asking where it was from
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DiAntonio

customer_reviews.title: but that is not useful.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Airplane seats are too close together. I could make it support under my knees, but that is not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Nice foot rest!
customer_reviews.text: I like this hammock for my feet. I work at home and always feel like I use the wall or needed something to put my feet on and this works. I would give it 5 stars but I can't make it any better than I have. Overall it works for my feet as a rest so no complaints on that!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Wife has never been more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always had a hard time with her feet when we fly. She's 5'1" and always ends up resting her feet on the seat back pocket if he seat in front of her. I bought this and we used it the other day on a flight from SFO to FLL and she said she has never been more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek D

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...not sure if it will work for me
customer_reviews.text: After a few tries, I can seem to get it to work for me when traveling. I’m 5’9” and perhaps this is better suited for a smaller person. I’m taking another cross country trip this weekend and will give it one more shot...
customer_reviews.author: mheckle

customer_reviews.title: I like this I had gotten this initially because I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this I had gotten this initially because I have a very very very short legs and I said a chair all day and it's super annoying so I wanted this for my desk so I can kind of put a foot or two up here and there and it's working very well right now it's really easy to set up and it is not in the way when I'm not using it either so works great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Makes flying a little more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This little foot sling will make traveling in coach a little less dreadful! it attaches securely to the tray table in airplanes, creating a foot rest that's quite comfortable. Unlike those bulky flight pillows, this little gadget won't add any extra weight, it's very compact and light
customer_reviews.author: Xime3

customer_reviews.title: I am petite - so this is great so my legs aren't dangling
customer_reviews.text: I am petite - so this is great so my legs aren't dangling. I feel I have to be a bit careful not to put too much pressure on it when I am moving around since it rests on the tray table in the upright position.
customer_reviews.author: LTK

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and having it saved my life, but the foot sling would be much improved if there was a sturdy bottom footplate to rest your feet on. As it is, you feet slide together to the middle and its not very comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my kiddo in the car so her legs aren't dangling off the seat, which reduces pressure on the back of her knees, and also helps alleviate a lot of seat kicking. Seems of pretty good quality, stays secure. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Dannica Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 7 hr flight to Germany. The concept is great - I was able to put my feet up during the flight and it made it much more comfortable. It did, however, break about 4 hours into the flight. The strap let go. I tied it (kinda) and was able to use it for the rest of the flight, but I saw the stitching on other side was also trying to let go, so I didn't use it on the flight home. I'm going to try to reinforce both sides and see if it will hold better.
customer_reviews.author: David J Mello

customer_reviews.title: Great for vertically challenged individuals :)
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and my legs NEVER touch the floor, which makes sitting for periods of time uncomfortable. I finally got to use this footrest on my 4 hour flight and it was fantastic! No more propping my feet up on seat backs or stepping on my poor bags to avoid the inevitable back ache from dangling legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who would have thought this item would be so effective
customer_reviews.text: I saw this item while shopping on Amazon for a travel pillow. I have never slept so well in a coach seat, 11-hour flight as I did with the "turtl" head support and this foot rest. My greatest problem in a coach airline seating is changing my hip angles enough to avoid discomfort-- this takes care of that issue-- sleep for a while with both feet up, then turn the other direction, then one foot up, then the other, then feet on floor. Every time I started to wake up I would just change a variable and drop off again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysi12

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on long-haul flights, sitting in Premium Economy so help relax and move my legs into other positions than just sitting, legs stretched. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper617

customer_reviews.title: What on Earth is this Thing?
customer_reviews.text: This came as part of a package deal with a projector. I would be shocked if anyone used this item.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product
customer_reviews.text: This is the must have for international travel. We used it in our 10 hours plus flights and could not be happier. Very sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Best $13. 99 I've spent
customer_reviews.text: Best $13.99 I've spent! How has it taken me this long to find this? Makes all the difference on flights - especially when you want to sleep. On my last overnight flight, I slept takeoff to wheels down (in economy), with major credit to the foot rest (or foot hammock as I seem to call it when telling friends about it). A good sleep on the plane makes a huge difference for me on the days that follow. This helps so much!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It was kind of hard to get it high enough ...
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of hard to get it high enough to make a difference and not have my feet still be on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to sit with my legs elevated. When flying, I would try to rig my carryon to act as a footstool, but it would collapse or otherwise fail. When I saw this footrest, I knew my problem was solved. I have flown from the East Coast to Hawai'i and my legs were so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Puppyraiser

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing on the tray table in front of you
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing on the tray table in front of you, adjustable straps make it convenient to adjust the level of the footrest.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Simple but does its job
customer_reviews.text: I use this on trips all the time and it keeps my feet elevated very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping and at home
customer_reviews.text: Just came back from my trip. The item is good, but the space in airplane is too small to use this one. I mean, If you only need it for camping or use it at home, it’s very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Helped my lower back pain on long plane rides
customer_reviews.text: As a short person with lower back pain, I usually dread airplane rides because I can never get comfortable. This worked perfectly for me on 2 long international flights. Very easy to set up and adjust. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ... on a long haul trip to Europe this was amazing. Very well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought this was a joke but let me tell you on a long haul trip to Europe this was amazing. Very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This simple thing is amazing! I am old enough to remember having fold-down foot rests, and this is an easy way to have a foot rest! Excellent idea and so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kazzoo

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this product when you travel.
customer_reviews.text: The sling was delivered quickly and in good condition. I originally didn't think I would enjoy this, but it really makes a difference during a long flight. Being able to suspend one or both feet during a long flight was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Olechnowicz

customer_reviews.title: Will provide you comfort during long- hours travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and this foot rest definitely made my long trips more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Olina H.

customer_reviews.title: Great during pregnancy to help swelling
customer_reviews.text: Used this for under my desk during my pregnancy. It helped keep my feet from swelling during the day at work!
customer_reviews.author: ECgirlinCA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice idea. This portable food rest is lightweight and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice idea. This portable food rest is lightweight and easy to carry for traveling. It is comfortable to use when you sit for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just bought two of these for a 14 hour trip to China. So worth it. I am 5'4 and can never get comfortable, this allowed for elevation that decreased the discomfort. I bought one for my young daughter as well, and she agreed it helped.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Love this foot rest
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot rest! Used it on my flight from slc to ams and it's works great. Always in my handbag when I'm flying.
customer_reviews.author: Nitesha Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use as an alternative to a $75 neck hammock for stretching. Life hack
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used it a couple of times already on my long haul flights.Made me feel more comfortable sitting.It's pretty sturdy and light. Great footrest! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Radiyo

customer_reviews.title: Great for coach travel
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just make sure you are not in bulkhead or the exit row.
customer_reviews.author: TKEGG

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: We recently traveled to Europe and I used this footrest for part of the flight. It was easy to attach to the tray table and was a relief to my legs. Great idea and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Steele

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's lightweight and easy to use. I carried it in my handbag. I just hung it over the seat tray in front of me and that was it. It really helped me arrive to my international destination with my legs relaxed. I've recommended to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Lucia Cantuaria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This helped me on a flight back from Australia. It was strong and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and this was very helpful in the plane. I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a great ideam
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually tried it yet but I bought it for flying hoping it will help my feet from swelling as any elevation helps.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kazo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use on the plane. I use it for myself and my 7 year old daughter who loved it! She could relax and stretch her legs thanks to Meyoung foot rest. Very useful , especially when there is no foot rest under the seat in front of you. It is soft and relaxing for the feet,
customer_reviews.author: Izabela Zaayman

customer_reviews.title: Works good..
customer_reviews.text: Works good... light and compact. Takes the stress off the knees and my feet were less swollen after the flight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is horribly uncomfortable. You're legs get smashed together. The only good part is that it is easy to use. Otherwise I wouldn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: It is obvious they're number one priority is making sure the customer it is completely happy with their products and the delivery
customer_reviews.text: The foot sling worked well on our long flights and most importantly the company that sells them was very customer care oriented. It is obvious they're number one priority is making sure the customer it is completely happy with their products and the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great product came in just in time before my flight
customer_reviews.text: Great product came in just in time before my flight, so I had to try it on plane and it works great! You can adjust the length and stuff, it also has pads on it so your calfs don't get sore. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Im disabled and use them when im riding in a car or able enough to use my walker. Totally a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: M. Petry

customer_reviews.title: Great for international flights.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have purchased. These are great for plane rides. Great quality and this one has a better bag to keep it in than the other 2 I purchased at a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Cynymart

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift during Christmas and unable to return even unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for my 9 hour trip from Spain and I LOVE IT! Easy to carry, easy to use. This product makes hours of traveling a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pola

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I travel internationally and need my legs elevated. I normally try to put my feet up on a bag, but the foot sling has been a life saver if my bag doesn't always fit under the seat. It's small and easy to pack. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: ahenne

customer_reviews.title: It also helped me sleep better (even in Economy class)
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this hammock on a long flight from LA to Australia and it helped improve my comfort level tremendously. It also helped me sleep better (even in Economy class). I won't go on long flights without it ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy sling
customer_reviews.text: Rigging it under my desk was a bit tricky but it gives first one leg and then the other a needed rest while I work at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: mustreadarchitecture

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for a long flight. I would definitely recommend for a short person!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this on two trips. It really help me a lot to stretch legs .
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for use in travel. I bought this for use on an international flight and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Strom

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: ripped on first trip luckily I had a safety pin to fix it and continue using. It was comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: dw'sdi

customer_reviews.title: Great lil product
customer_reviews.text: Great lil product, nice for elevating feet if you have the right kind of tray table to hang it on.

customer_reviews.title: ... very speedy with delivery and it came in a nice pouch
customer_reviews.text: They were very speedy with delivery and it came in a nice pouch
customer_reviews.author: Babypanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The footslings are valuable for long trips. My ankles didn’t swell and I slept.
customer_reviews.author: debra bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, broke immediately.
customer_reviews.text: This was somewhat useful but one of the straps broke within the first 10 minutes on my flight. I've only used it that one time. I'm 5'6", 130lbs... did not expect the quality to be so poor. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chairman Mao

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't waste my money
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't waste my money...not bad just not really helpful in making a long trip in a plane more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: this kept my legs super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly simple product that will forever be in my carry on bag. From USA to France and back, this kept my legs super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: grumpyoldperson

customer_reviews.title: This works great, It was easy to use and made traveling ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great, It was easy to use and made traveling on the plane much more comfortable on my short legs!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: there is no place to hang it on the plane ...
customer_reviews.text: there is no place to hang it on the plane and if you do, there is no room to straighten out your legs.
customer_reviews.author: rookie

customer_reviews.title: I won't fly without it
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 ft 3 in and have always had trouble with foot and ankle swelling on long flights. I had a portable folding stool, but it is bulky and heavier than it should be - and since you carry it on, that matters. Looking for an alternative, I found this and will never again fly without it. After a six hour flight I could hardly tell that I had been in a plane seat that long. It's light and easy to stuff anywhere in a bag. Usage note: After some adjustments I found that it worked best with the tray down.
customer_reviews.author: K. Berg

customer_reviews.title: he love it so much
customer_reviews.text: My husband always trying to put his feet up on the airplane, this one just meet what he want, he love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Blue sky

customer_reviews.title: Broke on First Use
customer_reviews.text: Broke on first use. I was so excited and the moment I put my legs in, it immediately broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kleine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it on my trip to and from Mexico. It is light weight and compact. Easy to use.

product_meta.title: Angemay Foot Rest, Office Footrest Adjustable Foot Hammock for Desk Foot Sling Airplane Travel Accessories (Small)
feature_bullets: Adjustable foot rest hammock, your travel accessories foot sling for airplane, cushion to relieve knee pain.
Easy to install the office foot hammock, under the desk or table, reduces pressure on your back and feet pain.
Pretty suitable for airline trip, office under the desk or table, school, train, long-distance subway.
Ultra light weight with 3 oz. and folded size 8*2*2 inch, mini and portable carry-on airline footrest, not increase your bag's burden.
Add much more foams to provide comfortable product experience and reinforce the strap according to customers’ suggestions.
